app.title: Quiz
categories.title: Learning Materials - Quiz Categories
categories.explore_desc: Explore {} topics and test your knowledge with interactive quizzes.
categories.check_back: Please check back later for available quiz categories.
subcategories.explore_quizzes: Explore quizzes and test your knowledge in this specialized area.
subcategories.no_subcategories_desc: There are no subcategories available for this category yet.
topics.no_topics_desc: There are no topics available for this category yet.
titles.no_quizzes_desc: There are no quizzes available for this topic yet.
quiz.question: Question
quiz.error: Error loading quiz. Please try again.
quiz.no_explanation: No explanation available for this question.
manual.title: Quiz Application User Manual
manual.subtitle: Complete guide to using all features of the quiz application
manual.getting_started_desc: Welcome to the Quiz Application! This interactive learning platform allows you to test your knowledge across various subjects with customizable quiz experiences.
manual.access_browser: Open your web browser and navigate to the application URL
manual.access_responsive: The application is fully responsive and works on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
manual.access_support: Supports modern web browsers with JavaScript enabled
manual.language_desc: The application supports multiple languages including English, Hungarian, and Vietnamese. You can change the language using the user menu in the top navigation.
manual.categories_desc: The application organizes quizzes into different categories to help you find relevant content easily.
manual.category_grid: Categories are displayed in an attractive grid layout with color-coded cards
manual.category_responsive: Responsive design adapts to different screen sizes (1 column on mobile, 2 on tablet, 3 on desktop)
manual.category_hover: Interactive hover effects provide visual feedback
manual.category_navigation: Click "Start Learning" to explore quizzes in that category
manual.category_tip: üí° **Tip:** Each category has a unique color theme to help you quickly identify different subject areas.
manual.quiz_selection_desc: After selecting a category, you'll see available quizzes with detailed information and customization options.
manual.quiz_title_desc: **Title and Description:** Clear overview of the quiz content
manual.quiz_objectives: **Learning Objectives:** Expandable section showing what you'll learn
manual.quiz_start_button: **Start Quiz Button:** Opens the configuration modal
manual.config_desc: Before starting a quiz, you can customize your experience:
manual.time_estimator_desc: Shows estimated completion time based on number of questions (approximately 10 seconds per question)
manual.question_count_desc: Use the range slider to select how many questions you want (minimum 10, maximum varies by quiz)
manual.quiz_play_desc: The quiz interface is designed for an optimal learning experience with comprehensive tracking and feedback.
manual.timer_circular: ‚Ä¢ Circular progress indicator shows remaining time
manual.progress_circular: ‚Ä¢ Circular progress bar fills as you advance
manual.question_card: Questions are displayed in clean, readable cards
manual.question_options: Multiple choice options with hover effects
manual.question_submit: Submit Answer button to confirm your selection
manual.helper_desc: The floating help button in the bottom-right corner provides language filtering options:
manual.helper_all: üåê **All Languages (Default):** Show questions in all languages
manual.quiz_tip: üí° **Pro Tip:** You can pause the timer at any time by clicking on it, giving you the flexibility to take a break without penalty.
manual.results_desc: After completing a quiz, you'll receive comprehensive results and the opportunity to review your performance.
manual.score_circle: Large circular display showing your percentage score
manual.score_breakdown: Clear breakdown of correct vs. total questions
manual.wrong_answers_desc: The application automatically compiles all questions you answered incorrectly for review:
manual.explanation_desc: For wrong answers with explanations, a detailed modal provides:
manual.explanation_detailed: Detailed explanation of the correct answer
manual.explanation_continue: Continue button to proceed through review
manual.results_tip: üìö **Learning Tip:** Use the wrong answers review to identify knowledge gaps and focus your future study efforts.
manual.dark_mode_desc: The application automatically adapts to your system's dark/light mode preference, providing comfortable viewing in any lighting condition.
manual.multilingual_switch: Switch between English, Hungarian, and Vietnamese
manual.multilingual_content: Both interface and quiz content support multiple languages
manual.responsive_mobile: Optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop
manual.responsive_adaptive: Adaptive layouts for different screen sizes
manual.navigation_breadcrumb: Clear navigation breadcrumbs in the header
manual.navigation_home: Home button to return to categories
manual.navigation_context: Context-aware navigation based on current location
manual.fix_browser: ‚Ä¢ Try a different browser or update your current one
manual.browser_modern: Modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
manual.support_note: üìû **Need Help?** If you continue to experience issues, please contact support through the footer links or check for updates to the application.
landing.quiz_me_desc: A simple quiz to test your knowledge.
back.button.label: Back
